title: Black Screen of death D:
body:
Past couple days i've been black screens while in game. I'll be playing normally and than the game will freeze, the screen will go black, and i can still hear sound and it stays black for about 5-6 seconds i cant move or anything during this time.

I've tried re-installing league, i've tried repairing it. It happens at random times, so there's no trigger to it. i could be in a team fight and boom black screen, i could be in lane and boom black screen.

if anyone knows a fix to this that'd be awesome, and yes my GPU drivers and all my drivers are up to date.

OS: Windows 10
CPU - amd fx 6300
GPU - rx 460
Mobo asus m5a87-usb3
16bg corsair ddr3 1600 ram
seagate barracuda 1tb hybrid drive

replies.body: It seems like you were able to establish a connection, but some driver or hardware issue is failing to render the game properly.   Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help with tuning up your drivers and getting this all fixed.  Hope that helps!
